pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Olx Web ScraperCLI to Scrape OLX for Ad listing (Optimized for Car/Motocycle ads)## Table of Contents - [Installation](#installation) - [Usage](#usage)## Installation1. Create a virtual enviroment for the repo & activate it ```pythonpython -m venv venvcd venvScripts\activate.bat```3. Install the scraper ```pythonpip install olx-web-scraper```## Usage- To get scraping, simple run the following on your prefered terminal:```pythonolx_web_scraper ```Eg:`pythonolx_web_scraper scraped_data`- Next, input the URL to scrape```OLX Web Scraper!URL: https://www.olx.in/kerala_g2001160/q-interceptor-650```- This will then scrape all the listing available and save to a file named scraped_data.csv in your root folder.
